titles: A proclamation discharging forraign copper-coyn to be imported or made use of in this kingdom
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Additional imprint statement: This may be Reprinted at London, R.L.S. May the 28th. 1686. By E. Mallet.
At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the twentieth day of May, one thousand six hundred eighty six years.
keywords: Coinage --  Law and legislation --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
